movement_distance.question_template: How far was the {object_name} moved from {state1} to {state2}?

new_visible_objects.question_template: Which objects became visible between {state1} and {state2}?

lost_visible_objects.question_template: Among {state1} and {state2}, which objects are no longer visible?

objects_room_movement.question_template: Which of the following objects changed rooms between {state1} and {state2}?

longest_observed_object_type.question_template: Among {state1} and {state2}, which object has the longest total observation time?

shortest_observed_object_type.question_template: Among {state1} and {state2}, which object has the shortest total observation time?

largest_diff_observation_time.question_template: Among {state1} and {state2}, which object has the largest difference in observation time between the two states?

smallest_diff_observation_time.question_template: Among {state1} and {state2}, which object has the smallest difference in observation time between the two states?

attribute_changed_objects.question_template: Which of the following objects had any attribute changes between {state1} and {state2}(excluding positional movements)?

room_attribute_changed_objects.question_template: In {room}, which of the following objects had attribute changes between {state1} and {state2}(excluding positional movements)?

room_position_changes.question_template: In {room}, which objects changed position between {state1} and {state2}?

openness_state_comparison.question_template: What was the openness state of {object_name} in {state1} and {state2}?

toggle_state_comparison.question_template: What was the power state of {object_name} in {state1} and {state2}?

cleanliness_state_comparison.question_template: What was the cleanliness state of {object_name} in {state1} and {state2}?

cooking_state_comparison.question_template: What was the cooking state of {object_name} in {state1} and {state2}?

liquid_state_comparison.question_template: What was the liquid filling state of {object_name} in {state1} and {state2}?

breaking_state_comparison.question_template: What was the condition of {object_name} in {state1} and {state2}?
